verses.verse: And <S%G3752>when<s%> He <S%G455>broke<s%> the <S%G1442>seventh<s%> <S%G4973>seal,<s%> there was <S%G4602>silence<s%> in <S%G3772>heaven<s%> for <S%G5613>about<s%> <S%G2256>half<s%> an <S%G2256>hour.<s%>

And I <S%G3708>saw<s%> the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2476>stand<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> <S%G2316>God;<s%> and <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G4536>trumpets<s%> were <S%G1325>given<s%> to them.

And <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> and <S%G2476>stood<s%> at the <S%G2379>altar,<s%> <S%G2192>holding<s%> a <S%G5552>golden<s%> <S%G3031>censer;<s%> and <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G2368>incense<s%> was <S%G1325>given<s%> to him, that he might <S%G1325>add<s%> it to the <S%G4335>prayers<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G40>saints<s%> upon the <S%G5552>golden<s%> <S%G2379>altar<s%> which was <S%G1799>before<s%> the <S%G2362>throne.<s%>

And the <S%G2586>smoke<s%> of the <S%G2368>incense,<s%> with the <S%G4335>prayers<s%> of the <S%G40>saints,<s%> <S%G305>went<s%> up <S%G1799>before<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> out of the angel's <S%G5495>hand.<s%>

And the <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G2983>took<s%> the <S%G3031>censer;<s%> and he <S%G1072>filled<s%> it with the <S%G4442>fire<s%> of the <S%G2379>altar<s%> and <S%G906>threw<s%> it to the <S%G1093>earth;<s%> and there <S%G1096>followed<s%> <S%G1027>peals<s%> of <S%G1027>thunder<s%> and <S%G5456>sounds<s%> and <S%G796>flashes<s%> of <S%G796>lightning<s%> and an <S%G4578>earthquake.<s%>
And the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> who <S%G2192>had<s%> the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G4536>trumpets<s%> <S%G2090>prepared<s%> <S%G848>themselves<s%> to <S%G4537>sound<s%> them.

And the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G4537>sounded,<s%> and there <S%G1096>came<s%> <S%G5464>hail<s%> and <S%G4442>fire,<s%> <S%G3396>mixed<s%> with <S%G129>blood,<s%> and they were <S%G906>thrown<s%> to the <S%G1093>earth;<s%> and a <S%G5154>third<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth<s%> was <S%G2618>burned<s%> up, and a <S%G5154>third<s%> of the <S%G1186>trees<s%> were <S%G2618>burned<s%> up, and <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G5515>green<s%> <S%G5528>grass<s%> was <S%G2618>burned<s%> up.

And the <S%G1208>second<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G4537>sounded,<s%> and [something] <S%G5613>like<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G3735>mountain<s%> <S%G2545>burning<s%> with <S%G4442>fire<s%> was <S%G906>thrown<s%> into the <S%G2281>sea;<s%> and a <S%G5154>third<s%> of the <S%G2281>sea<s%> <S%G1096>became<s%> <S%G129>blood;<s%>

and a <S%G5154>third<s%> of the <S%G2938>creatures,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> were in the <S%G2281>sea<s%> and <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G5590>life,<s%> <S%G599>died;<s%> and a <S%G5154>third<s%> of the <S%G4143>ships<s%> were <S%G1311>destroyed.<s%>

And the <S%G5154>third<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G4537>sounded,<s%> and a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G792>star<s%> <S%G4098>fell<s%> from <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G2545>burning<s%> <S%G5613>like<s%> a <S%G2985>torch,<s%> and it <S%G4098>fell<s%> on a <S%G5154>third<s%> of the <S%G4215>rivers<s%> and on the <S%G4077>springs<s%> of <S%G5204>waters;<s%>

and the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the <S%G792>star<s%> is <S%G3004>called<s%> <S%G894>Wormwood;<s%> and a <S%G5154>third<s%> of the <S%G5204>waters<s%> <S%G1096>became<s%> <S%G894>wormwood;<s%> and <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G599>died<s%> from the <S%G5204>waters,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> they were <S%G4087>made<s%> <S%G4087>bitter.<s%>

And the <S%G5067>fourth<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G4537>sounded,<s%> and a <S%G5154>third<s%> of the <S%G2246>sun<s%> and a <S%G5154>third<s%> of the <S%G4582>moon<s%> and a <S%G5154>third<s%> of the <S%G792>stars<s%> were <S%G4141>smitten,<s%> <S%G2443>so<s%> that a <S%G5154>third<s%> of them might be <S%G4654>darkened<s%> and the <S%G2250>day<s%> might not <S%G5316>shine<s%> for a <S%G5154>third<s%> of it, and the <S%G3571>night<s%> in the <S%G3668>same<s%> <S%G3668>way.<s%>

And I <S%G3708>looked,<s%> and I <S%G191>heard<s%> an <S%G105>eagle<s%> <S%G4072>flying<s%> in <S%G3321>midheaven,<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice,<s%> <S%G3759>"Woe,<s%> <S%G3759>woe,<s%> <S%G3759>woe,<s%> to <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G2730>dwell<s%> on the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> <S%G1537>because<s%> of the <S%G3062>remaining<s%> <S%G5456>blasts<s%> of the <S%G4536>trumpet<s%> of the <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> who are <S%G3195>about<s%> to <S%G4537>sound!<s%>"
